thread.title: Jason Gallagher
thread.title_full: RC Planet reviewed by Jason Gallagher

author: Jason Gallagher
title: Jason Gallagher
text: I ordered the road rage tires and rims that would fit. I forgot to get glue for them but that's ok. I got some. Tires have not been tested out yet. Due to weather. They look nice üëç and roll smooth. I'm happy. But the shipping and rolling Prices are crazy! Other then that, everything was good üòä. Thanks RC Planet üåé
